title: About Us — PEREC.news
description: Learn more about the philosophy, sections and mission of the satirical media PEREC.news
ogDescription: Perec.news is a political-satirical online media that covers hot topics with humor and irony.
heading: About Us
paragraph1: Perec.news is a political-satirical online platform that covers relevant news, events, and trends with sharp irony, humor, and analysis.
paragraph2: Our specialty is fact-based humor without unnecessary cynicism.
paragraph3: Our motto: “We spice up boring news.”
paragraph4: We challenge traditional media by making news not only informative but also captivating.
audiencePoints: Active readers: People aged 20–45 with critical thinking, interested in politics, economy, society, and culture.
Tired of dry news: Those seeking an informal and entertaining take on serious topics.
Satire lovers: Fans of witty and sharp humor.

sectionsList.title: Political Pepper:

sectionsList.title: Life Spicy Like Chili:

sectionsList.title: Economy on Fire:

sectionsList.title: Pop Culture in Pepper:

sectionsList.title: Unfiltered News:
sectionsList.text: The most absurd, funny and unexpected headlines that you just can’t ignore.

sectionsList.title: Spicy Shot:

missionText: To deliver important topics through the prism of irony and humor, making news accessible, easy to perceive, yet deep in essence.
